description:
Lee and Naruto seek help from their friends the day before their summer homework is due.  Unfortunately for them, they also seem to have forgotten all the craziness that happened over the summer...
Lee`s team visits the Academy, only to find a class of lazy kids who mock Lee for working so hard.  Can Lee teach them the joys of dilligence?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Always Do Your Homework at the Last Minute! / Class 3-Lee! We Are Team Guy!
宿題とは期限前日にやるのが基本です! / 3年リー組! ガイ班です!
